heading: HR01704
0: A RESOLUTION CALLING ON A CONGRESSIONAL INQUIRY ON THE GOVERNMENT AGENCIES AND PRIVATE ESTABLISHMENTS CONCERNED WITH HOUSING, TO BARE THEIR RESPECTIVE MANDATES, RULES AND PROCEDURES, ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES RELATIVE TO THE REALIZATION OF THE HOUSING DREAMS OF OUR OVERSEAS FILIPINOS, IN ORDER TO ESTABLISH A SIMPLIFIED BUT COHERENT GUIDE WHICH THEY MAY REFER TO AND RELY ON, IN AID OF LEGISLATION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2018-02-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01704
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CALLING ON A CONGRESSIONAL INQUIRY ON THE GOVERNMENT AGENCIES AND PRIVATE ESTABLISHMENTS CONCERNED WITH HOUSING, TO BARE THEIR RESPECTIVE MANDATES, RULES AND PROCEDURES, ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES RELATIVE TO THE REALIZATION OF THE HOUSING DREAMS OF OUR OVERSEAS FILIPINOS, IN ORDER TO ESTABLISH A SIMPLIFIED BUT COHERENT GUIDE WHICH THEY MAY REFER TO AND RELY ON, IN AID OF LEGISLATION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BERTIZ, ANICETO "JOHN" III D.
DATE FILED : 2018-02-20
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Lopez (M.L.) (000 2018-07-24)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS ON 2018-02-28
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2018-02-21;
